mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Specializing in Zero Trust Privileged Access Management within security domain, offering platform with policy-based controls, continuous authorization, and simplified access management to databases, servers, and Kubernetes

mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Modern Cloud PAM solution built to support variety of cloud networks including public, private, multi-cloud, and hybrid. Easy deployment through self-healing mesh network of proxies. Cloud-native approach.
